title: Search for a link
brief_description: A documentary that examines the hypothesis that the human mind can influence the body’s defences. Experts are now testing to see if there is a link between certain personalities and the susceptibility to cancer. Researchers, in this field, discuss their experiments, and whether there is such a thing as a “cancer personality”.
